Text.Language: A oum/s n~c~himi [itaio: a~re[ici n~yo e~hoterwou t/rou: je n~yo pe p~sousou n~niparyenoc: ]yeo~tokoc Maria.
Many women received honor, you are exalted more than all of them, for you are the pride of the virgins, Mother of God Mary.
